info.tip0: Use the delete key to remove a node.
info.tip1: Press the Deploy button above to start the flow running. You can choose to deploy the whole flow or just the changes.
info.tip2:
Options like Show grid and Snap to grid are under the menu icon
View
info.tip3: ctrl . or âŒ˜ . can be used to search for nodes and tabs.
info.tip4: Manage palette can be used to find, add and remove extra nodes.
info.tip5:
Nodes may install examples under
Import Examples
info.tip6:
Lots of example flows can be found on flows.nodered.org
They can then be imported by drag and drop to the workspace.
info.tip7: Shift-click and drag on a connector to move all the attached wires in one go.
info.tip8: The Node-RED Dashboard package can be used to create simple User Interfaces.
info.tip9: ctrlspace will toggle the view of this sidebar.
